Title: First official release of LLVM Flang
Description:
LLVM has included a Fortran compiler “Flang” since LLVM 11 in late 2020.
However, until recently the Flang binary was not flang (like clang) but instead flang-new.
LLVM 20 ends the era of flang-new.
